definition: the left-radical form of Kangxi radical 145, 衣[yi1]
woman's suit/dress worn over a petticoat
favoritism shown to sb because of the influence of the person's wife or other female relative/(by extension) favoritism towards relatives, friends or associates
waistband of a skirt/(fig.) related to the wife or another female family member
the practice of favoring sb because of the influence of the person's wife or other female relative/(by extension) culture of favoritism towards relatives, friends and associates

sentences.english: Speaking of handicrafts, in addition to the dirndl.
sentences.chinese: 說到手工藝品，除了緊腰寬裙之外。

sentences.english: The object was inside her skirt.
The suggestive sheerness of this shirt is juxtaposed with an androgynous bow tie and a bright printed skirt.
sentences.chinese: 這件透視襯衫搭配中性領結和亮色印花裙，效果很好。

sentences.english: Contrast color puffy sleeves and frilled hem.
sentences.chinese: 撞色布泡泡袖及有褶飾邊裙腳。

sentences.english: We want to buy Scarves, Stoles, Pareos and Made-Ups, Shawls.
sentences.chinese: 我們要採購圍巾，女用坎肩，海灘裙和裝扮，披肩。

sentences.english: Most dirndls are hand-made and rather pricey.
sentences.chinese: 大部分緊腰寬裙都是手工縫製的，價格相當昂貴。

sentences.english: Won't you put on that other gown and bonnet again,--you know the ones I mean?
sentences.chinese: 你不打算再穿你那件裙袍，戴你那頂帽子了嗎？

sentences.english: Heels also look a lot better with pencil skirts than with trousers flapping around them.
sentences.chinese: 高跟鞋配鉛筆裙也要比配罩在四周的褲子好看的。

sentences.english: Dolce & Gabbana sent out a sultry ensemble of suits and lace dresses.
sentences.chinese: 而杜嘉班納產品主打性感套裝和蕾絲裙。

sentences.english: A womans costume with a tight bodice and an overskirt drawn back to reveal a colorful underskirt .
sentences.chinese: 一種由緊身衣和展示多彩的罩裙構成的女服。

sentences.english: Blown girl hair short skirt, Xiao Ling Tong shoes thin clothing.
sentences.chinese: 吹得女孩兒髮長裙短，小齡童衣單鞋薄。

sentences.english: Dress With Lining, Ribbon Fixed, Back with Elastic Band.
sentences.chinese: 此款連身裙有裏襯，蝴蝶結是固定的，後背是拉橡筋。

sentences.english: Taper your pencil skirt just slightly to give it some shape.
sentences.chinese: 讓你的鉛筆裙更緊縮一些來讓它有型。

sentences.english: The embroidered red silk organza illusion cap sleeve gown with tulle ruffle skirt is both romantic and dramatic in equal parts.
sentences.chinese: 這件紅色絲質刺繡的薄紗花邊裙看起來浪漫又復古。

sentences.english: C arlos: Mm-hmm, you wore a white linen sundress.
sentences.chinese: 你穿了一件白色亞麻背心裙。

sentences.english: Yet Ms. Wells has also rejected the below-the-knee skirts and neat matching sweaters suggested by her mother.
sentences.chinese: 但韋爾斯也拒絕母親提議的及膝裙和配套的毛衫。

definition: old feminine garment, covering chest and abdomen
ceremonial robe/formal attire (dinner suit, evening gown etc)
